Yes, there are several wine tour companies operating in Marlborough that offer great experiences for wine lovers. Here are a few options you may consider:

1. Marlborough Wine Tours
2. Na Clachan Wine Tours

These companies offer a variety of tours, from half-day to full-day, private and group tours, and specialize in showcasing the unique features of the Marlborough wine region. They usually include visits to several wineries, wine tastings, and knowledgeable commentary on the history and production of Marlborough wine. It's always best to do some research and read reviews to choose the tour that best suits your interests and needs.
I'm interested in the Marlborough Wine & Brew Tours. Have you heard anything specific about this tour?

Yes, the Marlborough Wine & Brew Tours is a great option for those who are interested in exploring the wine and beer scene of Marlborough. This tour starts in the morning and lasts for about 8 hours, and includes visits to four wineries and a craft beer brewery. Some of the popular wineries that the tour visits include Cloudy Bay, Wairau River Wines, Allan Scott Family Winemakers, and Saint Clair Family Estate. The tour includes tastings of wine and beer, and lunch is also provided. Many reviewers have praised the knowledgeable and friendly tour guides, as well as the variety of wineries and beer breweries visited on the tour. It is a great way to experience the best of both worlds in Marlborough and learn more about the region's wine and craft beer scene.
